name: SocialBlox
public_notice: SocialBlox (SBLX) has recently migrated from their old contract to a new one. For more information, please view this announcement on Twitter.
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.
The smart-contract owner can mint new tokens, please proceed with caution.

description.en:
SocialBlox is a privacy first social media platform. With the launch of SocialBlox app, users will be able to discover whole new social media features. By using blockchain technology it is now possible to set challenges to other users worldwide without the issue of trust. Conditional transactions will provide the much-needed safety to interact and bring social media to the next level. 

Our iOS app is already at beta testing stage with SocialBlox community members and will be alpha released in coming months. So, are you ready to accept a challenge, post the content and collect SBLX-tokens?
